section.section: The Secretary shall establish a Program to attempt to provide a volunteer mentor for each child in the State who has spent at least 30 days in a committed placement.
The Program shall be called "Maryland Rising".

text.section:
The purpose of the Program is to provide individualized attention to a child:
to decrease the child's delinquent or violent behavior in the community; and
to increase the child's potential for becoming a productive, successful member of the community.

section.section: To carry out the purpose of the Program, the Department shall develop a statewide network of State agencies, community agencies, citizen action groups, social services providers, volunteer organizations, college student groups, and other groups who will recruit volunteer mentors for the Program.

text.section: The Department may adopt regulations to implement this section.
